content: Oh, are you my new temp? Well, let me just get you up to speed. I know it's a bit of a mess. I'm just putting the finishing touches of my latest maniacal plan. You see, in a few minutes, I will unleash an unprecedented reign of terror upon the entire... Tri-State Area! And Perry the Platypus will never be the wiser. Perry the Platypus?! You're a temp? Are times that hard?
author: Dan Povenmire, Jeff "Swampy" Marsh
